column4: Hey, I'm a complete noob, can smoeone please tell me how to install from binaries, or where i can find the information out?
jrip: i'm trying to install PHP and mysql, i have apache installed. But there are no repositories?  I instlled apache a while ago using binaries, compileingthem myself, but i forget how
How come apt-get doesn't find them
installing from source will most likely have broken your system
